page.description: The TABLE.EXTERNAL_VARIABLES_GET() method returns a list of externally defined variables.
page.syntax: Variable_List as C = external_variables_get(C tablename[,C format[,C variable_context]])

argument.name: format
argument.description: A character, numeric, logical, or date data display format.

argument.name: variable_context
argument.description: A definition of the variable context, such as LOCAL_VARIABLES() or GLOBAL_VARIABLES().
